title: Sidewall, "The Horse Fair", 1855–75
inscribed: "The Horse Fair" exhibited in Paris in 1853.
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Vertical rectangle, divided by framework of architectural molding in yellow and brown into two long rectangles, top and bottom, with two squares between. Upper and lower rectangles contain free copy of Rosa Bonheur's "The Horse Fair". The center squares show figures and horses. Printed in reds, blues, greens and yellow.

exhibitions.title: Rooms with a View: Landscape & Wallpaper

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall, "The Horse Fair", 1855–75.
1855–75. Machine-printed. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1928-2-73.
